user_input: Modify the DHEM model.  o Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline)  o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.  o Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category call it something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.  o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities  o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step. Use the crud pipeline  o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the DHEM model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the most appropriate attribute from the available options.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the appropriate file for modification.

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class within the Gas Pipeline category and name it something relating to 'PCIPMI capacities Unlimited'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the most appropriate object creation context.

tasks.description: Update the newly created datafile object to add a filename property with the name of the datafile created in the previous step.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the appropriate property to update.

tasks.description: Add a scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', determine the correct scenario object context.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories of the gas pipeline class using the datafile and scenario created earlier.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the appropriate properties for update on the targeted objects.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' to create a new model called 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' using the clone pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', select the appropriate model for cloning.

tasks.description: Add the new scenario 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the cloned model using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model. ...', determine the correct context to add the scenario.
